ctx: NLB še ne bo izdala podrejenih obveznic; hudo drage bi bile, pa jih vseeno niso mogli prodati
content:
mogoce prispeva tudi to, da timing ni najboljsi

ECB begins great cash mop-up as banks repay 296 bln euros of
loans

"the biggest cash withdrawal from the euro zone's financial system
in the euro's 22-year history"

(pricakovano je bilo sicer se vec, cca 500 bln)


www.reuters.com/mark...022-11-18/
author: crt

ctx: NLB še ne bo izdala podrejenih obveznic; hudo drage bi bile, pa jih vseeno niso mogli prodati
content:
[]
mogoce prispeva tudi to, da timing ni najboljsi

ECB begins great cash mop-up as banks repay 296 bln euros of
loans

"the biggest cash withdrawal from the euro zone's financial system
in the euro's 22-year history"

(pricakovano je bilo sicer se vec, cca 500 bln)


www.reuters.com/mark...022-11-18/
Ja, očitno timing ni dober.
Sicer so pa prejšnjič prodajali z obretsno mero 9,721. Skok na
10,25 ne bi bil ravno velik.
Meni je bolj zoprno, da ne vem, zakaj sploh rabijo ta denar.
author: FjodorKirilovic
